ovdesc.p: The PAYOUT RULES Property Class is used by any products which have amounts billed and paid to the customer.

An arrangement may have several bills outstanding and each bill may be comprised of multiple amounts (e.g. principal, principal interest, tax, charges, etc.). When a customer request for a payment, the entire amount may not be satisfied. The PAYOUT RULES Property Class is used to define the method by which a single payment request will be applied to multiple bills and multiple amount types.

p>Optional field - Allowed Values are RESETTING and NON-RESETTING.
RESETTING - During any Renewal Activities (for eg : change.product, rollover or reset) the property conditions will be reset from the product.
NON-RESETTING - During any Renewal Activities property conditions will be maintained from the Arrangement level.
Leaving the field blank sets NON-RESETTING as the default option.
